Division Algorithm

DM
Nov 5, 2020

Let $a$ be an integer and $d$ be a positive integer then there exists two unique integers $q$ and $r$ ($0 \le r \le d$) such that $a= qd+r$.

GCD Calculation Algorithm

DM
Nov 4, 2020

Calculation of Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two integers $a$ and $b$ could be reduced to $\gcd(b\ mod\ a, a)$.
